languages.text: "Я... не возражаю", {n}— сдержанно говорит Арджента.{/n} "Возможно, близость великой святыни окажет благотворное влияние на тебя, Идира".

traits.locale_text: "Я... не возражаю", {n}— сдержанно говорит Арджента.{/n} "Возможно, близость великой святыни окажет благотворное влияние на тебя, Идира".

languages.text: "I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."
languages.original_text: "Я... не возражаю", {n}— сдержанно говорит Арджента.{/n} "Возможно, близость великой святыни окажет благотворное влияние на тебя, Идира".

traits.locale_text: "I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."
"I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."
"I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."
"I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."
"I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."

languages.text: 「我には…異論はない」{n}アルジェンタは静かに言った。{/n}「偉大なる聖遺物の代理を務める恩恵にあずかれるだろう、イディラ」
languages.original_text: "I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."

traits.locale_text: 「我には…異論はない」{n}アルジェンタは静かに言った。{/n}「偉大なる聖遺物の代理を務める恩恵にあずかれるだろう、イディラ」

languages.text: “我……没有异议。”{n}阿洁塔平静地回答道。{/n}“或许站在伟大圣物之前，你也能获得裨益，伊迪拉。”
languages.original_text: "I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."

traits.locale_text: “我……没有异议。”{n}阿洁塔平静地回答道。{/n}“或许站在伟大圣物之前，你也能获得裨益，伊迪拉。”

languages.text: « Je... je n'y vois pas d'objection. » {n}Argenta s'exprime calmement.{/n} « Peut-être gagnerez-vous à vous trouver en présence de la relique suprême, Idira. »
languages.original_text: "I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."

traits.locale_text: « Je... je n'y vois pas d'objection. » {n}Argenta s'exprime calmement.{/n} « Peut-être gagnerez-vous à vous trouver en présence de la relique suprême, Idira. »

languages.text: «No... tengo nada que objetar», {n}responde tranquilamente Argenta.{/n} «Tal vez le ayude estar en presencia de la gran reliquia, Idira».
languages.original_text: "I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."

traits.locale_text: «No... tengo nada que objetar», {n}responde tranquilamente Argenta.{/n} «Tal vez le ayude estar en presencia de la gran reliquia, Idira».

languages.text: "Ich ... habe nichts dagegen", {n}sagt Argenta ruhig.{/n} "Vielleicht ist es von Vorteil für Euch, so nahe bei dem großen Relikt zu stehen, Idira."
languages.original_text: "I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... habe nichts dagegen", {n}sagt Argenta ruhig.{/n} "Vielleicht ist es von Vorteil für Euch, so nahe bei dem großen Relikt zu stehen, Idira."

languages.text: "Benim... İtirazım yok." {n}Argenta sakince konuşuyor.{/n} "Böyle kadim bir yadigârın huzurunda bulunmanın faydasını görebilirsin İdira."
languages.original_text: "I... have no objections." {n}Argenta says calmly.{/n} "Perhaps it will benefit you to stand in the presence of the great relic, Idira."

traits.locale_text: "Benim... İtirazım yok." {n}Argenta sakince konuşuyor.{/n} "Böyle kadim bir yadigârın huzurunda bulunmak lehine olabilir İdira."
